name: Trade Federations
background: The Guilds of the Nexus are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal guild wars on the streets of the Nexus. These guilds are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular guild, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

spells.name: Mystical Jump
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Flying once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Crumple Armor
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with Decimate.

spells.name: Enhanced Construction
spells.effect: Pick up to four friendly units within 12", which get Exotic Gear Boost once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Ruinous Connection
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy models within 24", which take 1 hit with AP(4) each.

spells.name: Summoned Vipers
spells.effect: Pick up to six enemy units within 18", which counts as being in Dangerous Terrain once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Thousand Swords
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy units within 12", which take 3 hits each.

specialRules.name: Counter-Attack
specialRules.description: Strikes first when charged.

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: Shred
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Piercing Hunter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Piercing Hunter. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Decimate
specialRules.description: Ignores Cover, and against units where most models have Defense 2+ to Defense 3+, this weapon gets AP(+2).

specialRules.name: Rapid Charge Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game moves +4" when using Charge actions. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Counter-Attack Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Counter-Attack. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Exotic Gear
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated, pick one effect: until the end of the activation all models with this rule in it either get AP(+1) when attacking, or get +1 to hit rolls when attacking.

specialRules.name: Exotic Gear Boost Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Exotic Gear Boost. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Fearless Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Fearless. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Precision Spotter
specialRules.description: Once per activation, pick one enemy unit within 36" and in line of sight of this model and roll one die, on a 4+ place a marker on it. Friendly units may remove markers from their target before rolling to hit to get +X to hit rolls when attacking, where X is the number of removed markers.

specialRules.name: Dangerous Terrain Debuff
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which must immediately take a Dangerous Terrain test.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: Piercing Hunter
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, its weapons get AP(+1).

specialRules.name: Ignores Cover
specialRules.description: This weapon ignores cover.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Counter
specialRules.description: Strikes first with this weapon when charged, and the charging unit gets -1 total Impact rolls per model with Counter.

specialRules.name: Exotic Gear Boost
specialRules.description: If this model has Exotic Gear, it always gets both AP(+1) and +1 to hit rolls from Exotic Gear (instead of having to pick between AP(+1) or +1 to hit rolls).

specialRules.name: Fearless
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule fails a morale test, roll one die. On a 4+ it counts as passed instead.

specialRules.name: Fear
specialRules.description: This model counts as having dealt +X wounds when checking wound effects in melee (must deal at least one wound).

specialRules.name: Flying
specialRules.description: May move through units and terrain, and ignores terrain effects whilst moving, and automatically passes jumping rolls.
